successes.title: The Floyd Leg
successes.description: The Floyd Leg gives you the framework to take ownership of your furniture by allowing you to create a table from any flat surface.

Pledges.description: A personalized Floyd postcard/thank you of an image taken by us and mailed to you.
Set of four coasters to use on your table top.  Cut from the same 11 gauge US Steel used for the leg and designed in the same style.  Clear coated.

Solo Floyd 29" Table Leg - 
Powder coated BLACK or WHITE.  For those who need less or more than a full set.

Solo Floyd 16" Coffee Table Leg - 
Powder coated BLACK or WHITE.  For those who need less or more than a full set.

Set of (4) Floyd 29" Table Legs -  
Powder coated BLACK or WHITE.  The framework you need to create a table from any flat surface.

Set of (4) Floyd 16" Coffee Table Legs - 
Powder coated BLACK or WHITE.  The framework you need to create a table from any flat surface.

Foyer Table with BLACK or WHITE 29" legs -  
Custom narrow table made with a hand chosen piece of reclaimed material from Detroit.
Combo Set - Set of (4) Floyd 29" Table Legs and a set Floyd 16" Coffee Table Legs - Powder coated BLACK or WHITE. The framework you need to create tables from any flat surface.

Ground level visit to Detroit - Spend the day going behind the scenes of Floyd, checking out Detroit's great design culture and claiming a material for your Floyd Legs (included) - all with the Floyd design team.  Capped with a dinner at our favorite Detroit spot.
